name: AFGSplineHologram
comment: Base hologram for all spline type holograms.

methods.name: OnPendingConstructionHologramCreated_Implementation
methods.comment: Handles the pending hologram state copy

methods.name: IsConnectionSnapped
methods.comment: Checks if we have snapped to any connection

methods.name: GetLastSplineData
methods.comment: Returns reference to spline point data

methods.name: CheckClearanceForShapeIgnoreStructure
methods.comment: shape test used for spline hologram clerance tests

methods.name: OnRep_SplineData
methods.comment: Update the spline on the client.

properties.name: mSplineData
properties.comment: This is the data needed to create the spline component (local space).

properties.name: mIsConnectionSnappedOnConstruction
properties.comment: Used in the construction message to determine if this has snapped to an existing connection or not

properties.name: mActivePointIdx
properties.comment: Index of the currently moved point.
